answers.answer: but I had events in oct of 06- could my symptoms be from the 3 month prior event/ in Jan my lungs hurt when i took a deep breath, but notnow/ however/ starting last night i was VERY short of breath? and I am very tired and losing weight even if i m eating mc donalds milk shakes and heavy food - i think my glands are larger but a colleage is not sure/ she can t tell if they re swollen after just touching me (I m tired all the time but i admit, my sleep is not good, i m awake praying all night for a NEG test result on Friday

Your colleague is checking your lymph nodes? I hope s/he's a doctor... because that's the only person who would really be able to tell.For god's sake, you're coughing, your lungs hurt and it's hard to take a deep breath because you have *pneumonia*. Seriously, I think you should return to your doctor, since your symptoms are apparently worsening over time and while on medication. (but I must stress that the issue is NOT HIV)And if you're really worried about your health, you'd quit eating McDonalds. Jesus, that's what's going to kill you. Diabetes, heart disease, cancer...

Take care buddy. I have the same symptoms, exactly. Six weeks after possible exposure. What I have learnt from people on this site,, Dr. H, thebody.com and other HIV/AIDS sites is coughing/bronchitis/pneamonia is not a symptom of primary infection...and suprisingly there is a difference betweeen cold symptoms and flu symptoms...read up on it...i think you will sleep easiar. I know its hard, as I am in the same boat. BAD BAD cold, brochitis...its not an early symptom of HIV!
thanks, when were you suffering and are you/ did you turn +  (too bad you don t post your email/ i d love to contact you directly) thanks again
Dr. H is the doctor who answers hiv questions on this site.  Click on hiv & then click the Dr/Patient section.
i know THE BODY - but who is this Dr H? is that a web site? could you advise?  thanks/ regards
Last night I saw a purple spot under my skin which is a symptom of HIV - but today/ I called and my test was "definately negative"  God is great and merciful/ thank you all who said a prayer for me.

question: I had an event on 1/1/07 - some unprotected penetration but no ejaculation/ some oral but ejaculation by self masturbation. pnuuonia symtpoms on 1/5 - muscle achs of legs/ dizzy head ache and very sore throat. sore throat and leg aches gone by 1/8 but dizzy head ache still there. see nurse on 1/10 and put on anti biotics/ chest still hurting/ different antibiotics on 1/19 - diahrea begins on 1/19 - see DR on 2 /9 who tells me diahrea is from antibotics - he tells me i have a long term pneumonia and he is not worried/ he feels glands and looks at tounge (without light) and is not worrid. i look at tounge a few days later and see what looks like thrush/ by today/ i have had dry cough for weeks, and now and getting short of breath - am I HIV +?
title: do i have something to worry about?
